msgToOrbit: 1 year old, you're a baby :) My Orbit! Happy 1st anniversary :) There has been so many things, now that I'm thinking about the fact that it has only been a year since we made our full group debut and met Orbits. I thought about it a lot, but it has only been a year, and it means that there are many good things to come while we spend time together, so I'm very happy and excited! I miss you, Orbit. I'm always thankful and sorry, Orbit. Thank you for being with us. Love you
